abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat Brooklyn Nets, 129-105, to clinch playoff berth; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Utah, Houston and Dallas are locked in a race for the last two Western Conference playoff spots.

headline.main: Pacers Rout Nets to Make Playoffs; Three Battle On in West
headline.print_headline: Pacers Rout Nets to Make Playoffs; Three Battle On in West

snippet: Utah, Houston and Dallas are locked in a race for the last two Western Conference playoff spots.
